00033 /* Shader */

00035 Shader::Shader()
00036 {
00037     name = "";
00038     pass_id = 0;
00039 
00040     graph = NULL;
00041     graph_bump = NULL;
00042 
00043     sample_as_light = true;
00044     homogeneous_volume = false;
00045 
00046     has_surface = false;
00047     has_surface_transparent = false;
00048     has_surface_emission = false;
00049     has_volume = false;
00050     has_displacement = false;
00051 
00052     need_update = true;
00053     need_update_attributes = true;
00054 }
00055 
00056 Shader::~Shader()
00057 {
00058     delete graph;
00059     delete graph_bump;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void Shader::set_graph(ShaderGraph *graph_)
00063 {
00064     /* assign graph */
00065     delete graph;
00066     delete graph_bump;
00067     graph = graph_;
00068     graph_bump = NULL;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void Shader::tag_update(Scene *scene)
00072 {
00073     /* update tag */
00074     need_update = true;
00075     scene->shader_manager->need_update = true;
00076 
00077     /* if the shader previously was emissive, update light distribution,
00078      * if the new shader is emissive, a light manager update tag will be
00079      * done in the shader manager device update. */
00080     if(sample_as_light && has_surface_emission)
00081         scene->light_manager->need_update = true;
00082 
00083     /* get requested attributes. this could be optimized by pruning unused
00084        nodes here already, but that's the job of the shader manager currently,
00085        and may not be so great for interactive rendering where you temporarily
00086        disconnect a node */
00087     AttributeRequestSet prev_attributes = attributes;
00088 
00089     attributes.clear();
00090     foreach(ShaderNode *node, graph->nodes)
00091         node->attributes(&attributes);
00092     
00093     /* compare if the attributes changed, mesh manager will check
00094        need_update_attributes, update the relevant meshes and clear it. */
00095     if(attributes.modified(prev_attributes)) {
00096         need_update_attributes = true;
00097         scene->mesh_manager->need_update = true;
00098     }
00099 }

00101 /* Shader Manager */

00103 ShaderManager::ShaderManager()
00104 {
00105     need_update = true;
00106 }
00107 
00108 ShaderManager::~ShaderManager()
00109 {
00110 }

00112 ShaderManager *ShaderManager::create(Scene *scene)
00113 {
00114     ShaderManager *manager;
00115 
00116 #ifdef WITH_OSL
00117     if(scene->params.shadingsystem == SceneParams::OSL)
00118         manager = new OSLShaderManager();
00119     else
00120 #endif
00121         manager = new SVMShaderManager();
00122     
00123     add_default(scene);
00124 
00125     return manager;
00126 }
00127 
00128 uint ShaderManager::get_attribute_id(ustring name)
00129 {
00130     /* get a unique id for each name, for SVM attribute lookup */
00131     AttributeIDMap::iterator it = unique_attribute_id.find(name);
00132 
00133     if(it != unique_attribute_id.end())
00134         return it->second;
00135     
00136     uint id = (uint)Attribute::STD_NUM + unique_attribute_id.size();
00137     unique_attribute_id[name] = id;
00138     return id;
00139 }
00140 
00141 uint ShaderManager::get_attribute_id(Attribute::Standard std)
00142 {
00143     return (uint)std;
00144 }
00145 
00146 int ShaderManager::get_shader_id(uint shader, Mesh *mesh, bool smooth)
00147 {
00148     /* get a shader id to pass to the kernel */
00149     int id = shader*2;
00150     
00151     /* index depends bump since this setting is not in the shader */
00152     if(mesh && mesh->displacement_method != Mesh::DISPLACE_TRUE)
00153         id += 1;
00154     /* smooth flag */
00155     if(smooth)
00156         id |= SHADER_SMOOTH_NORMAL;
00157     
00158     /* default flags */
00159     id |= SHADER_CAST_SHADOW|SHADER_AREA_LIGHT;
00160     
00161     return id;
00162 }
00163 
00164 void ShaderManager::device_update_common(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene, Scene *scene, Progress& progress)
00165 {
00166     device_free_common(device, dscene);
00167 
00168     if(scene->shaders.size() == 0)
00169         return;
00170 
00171     uint shader_flag_size = scene->shaders.size()*4;
00172     uint *shader_flag = dscene->shader_flag.resize(shader_flag_size);
00173     uint i = 0;
00174 
00175     foreach(Shader *shader, scene->shaders) {
00176         uint flag = 0;
00177 
00178         if(shader->sample_as_light)
00179             flag |= SD_SAMPLE_AS_LIGHT;
00180         if(shader->has_surface_transparent)
00181             flag |= SD_HAS_SURFACE_TRANSPARENT;
00182         if(shader->has_volume)
00183             flag |= SD_HAS_VOLUME;
00184         if(shader->homogeneous_volume)
00185             flag |= SD_HOMOGENEOUS_VOLUME;
00186 
00187         shader_flag[i++] = flag;
00188         shader_flag[i++] = shader->pass_id;
00189         shader_flag[i++] = flag;
00190         shader_flag[i++] = shader->pass_id;
00191     }
00192 
00193     device->tex_alloc("__shader_flag", dscene->shader_flag);
00194 }
00195 
00196 void ShaderManager::device_free_common(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene)
00197 {
00198     device->tex_free(dscene->shader_flag);
00199     dscene->shader_flag.clear();
00200 }
00201 
00202 void ShaderManager::add_default(Scene *scene)
00203 {
00204     Shader *shader;
00205     ShaderGraph *graph;
00206     ShaderNode *closure, *out;
00207 
00208     /* default surface */
00209     {
00210         graph = new ShaderGraph();
00211 
00212         closure = graph->add(new DiffuseBsdfNode());
00213         closure->input("Color")->value = make_float3(0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f);
00214         out = graph->output();
00215 
00216         graph->connect(closure->output("BSDF"), out->input("Surface"));
00217 
00218         shader = new Shader();
00219         shader->name = "default_surface";
00220         shader->graph = graph;
00221         scene->shaders.push_back(shader);
00222         scene->default_surface = scene->shaders.size() - 1;
00223     }
00224 
00225     /* default light */
00226     {
00227         graph = new ShaderGraph();
00228 
00229         closure = graph->add(new EmissionNode());
00230         closure->input("Color")->value = make_float3(0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f);
00231         closure->input("Strength")->value.x = 0.0f;
00232         out = graph->output();
00233 
00234         graph->connect(closure->output("Emission"), out->input("Surface"));
00235 
00236         shader = new Shader();
00237         shader->name = "default_light";
00238         shader->graph = graph;
00239         scene->shaders.push_back(shader);
00240         scene->default_light = scene->shaders.size() - 1;
00241     }
00242 
00243     /* default background */
00244     {
00245         graph = new ShaderGraph();
00246 
00247         closure = graph->add(new BackgroundNode());
00248         closure->input("Color")->value = make_float3(0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f);
00249         out = graph->output();
00250 
00251         graph->connect(closure->output("Background"), out->input("Surface"));
00252 
00253         shader = new Shader();
00254         shader->name = "default_background";
00255         shader->graph = graph;
00256         scene->shaders.push_back(shader);
00257         scene->default_background = scene->shaders.size() - 1;
00258     }
00259 
00260     /* default holdout */
00261     {
00262         graph = new ShaderGraph();
00263 
00264         closure = graph->add(new HoldoutNode());
00265         out = graph->output();
00266 
00267         graph->connect(closure->output("Holdout"), out->input("Surface"));
00268 
00269         shader = new Shader();
00270         shader->name = "default_holdout";
00271         shader->graph = graph;
00272         scene->shaders.push_back(shader);
00273         scene->default_holdout = scene->shaders.size() - 1;
00274     }
00275 
00276     /* default empty */
00277     {
00278         graph = new ShaderGraph();
00279 
00280         shader = new Shader();
00281         shader->name = "default_empty";
00282         shader->graph = graph;
00283         scene->shaders.push_back(shader);
00284         scene->default_empty = scene->shaders.size() - 1;
00285     }
00286 }
